about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: To pass on a two-lane road, you should:

about.name: To pass on a two-lane road, you should:

hasPart.assesses: To pass on a two-lane road, you should: | To pass on a two-lane road, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It can be hard to judge the speed of oncoming vehicles. They do not always seem to be coming as fast as they really are. Always be sure you can safely change lanes when passing on a two-lane street. If you are not sure of an oncoming vehicle's speed, wait to pass until the oncoming vehicle has passed and you are sure there is enough space for you to change lanes safely.

suggestedAnswer.text: Sound your horn as you pass.

comment.text: Sound your horn as you pass.

suggestedAnswer.text: Flash your headlights as you pass.

comment.text: Flash your headlights as you pass.

suggestedAnswer.text: Judge the distance to any oncoming vehicles.

comment.text: Judge the distance to any oncoming vehicles.

acceptedAnswer.text: Judge the distance to any oncoming vehicles.

comment.text: Judge the distance to any oncoming vehicles.

answerExplanation.text: It can be hard to judge the speed of oncoming vehicles. They do not always seem to be coming as fast as they really are. Always be sure you can safely change lanes when passing on a two-lane street. If you are not sure of an oncoming vehicle's speed, wait to pass until the oncoming vehicle has passed and you are sure there is enough space for you to change lanes safely.

comment.text: To pass on a two-lane road, you should: | It can be hard to judge the speed of oncoming vehicles. They do not always seem to be coming as fast as they really are. Always be sure you can safely change lanes when passing on a two-lane street. If you are not sure of an oncoming vehicle's speed, wait to pass until the oncoming vehicle has passed and you are sure there is enough space for you to change lanes safely.

hasPart.name: If you approach a stopped school bus that has its lights flashing and signal arm extended, you should:

about.name: If you approach a stopped school bus that has its lights flashing and signal arm extended, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you approach a stopped school bus that has its lights flashing and signal arm extended, you should: | If you approach a stopped school bus that has its lights flashing and signal arm extended, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you approach a stopped school bus that has its lights flashing and arm extended, you must come to a full stop and remain stopped until the signal arm is pulled back and the bus resumes motion. This law applies whether you are traveling in the same direction as the bus or if you are approaching from the opposite side of the street.

comment.text: Stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: Proceed at 15 mph if no children are present.

comment.text: Proceed at 15 mph if no children are present.

suggestedAnswer.text: Proceed at normal speed, but watch for children.

comment.text: Proceed at normal speed, but watch for children.
Stop.

answerExplanation.text: If you approach a stopped school bus that has its lights flashing and arm extended, you must come to a full stop and remain stopped until the signal arm is pulled back and the bus resumes motion. This law applies whether you are traveling in the same direction as the bus or if you are approaching from the opposite side of the street.

comment.text: If you approach a stopped school bus that has its lights flashing and signal arm extended, you should: | If you approach a stopped school bus that has its lights flashing and arm extended, you must come to a full stop and remain stopped until the signal arm is pulled back and the bus resumes motion. This law applies whether you are traveling in the same direction as the bus or if you are approaching from the opposite side of the street.

hasPart.name: At intersections, crosswalks, and railroad crossings, you should always:

about.name: At intersections, crosswalks, and railroad crossings, you should always:

hasPart.assesses: At intersections, crosswalks, and railroad crossings, you should always: | At intersections, crosswalks, and railroad crossings, you should always: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Any time you come to a place where people may cross or enter your path, or where one line of traffic meets another, you should look to the left and right sides of your vehicle to make sure no one is coming.

comment.text: Stop, listen, and proceed cautiously.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look to the sides of your vehicle to see what is coming.

comment.text: Look to the sides of your vehicle to see what is coming.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slowly pass vehicles that seem to be stopped for no reason.

comment.text: Slowly pass vehicles that seem to be stopped for no reason.

acceptedAnswer.text: Look to the sides of your vehicle to see what is coming.

comment.text: Look to the sides of your vehicle to see what is coming.

answerExplanation.text: Any time you come to a place where people may cross or enter your path, or where one line of traffic meets another, you should look to the left and right sides of your vehicle to make sure no one is coming.

hasPart.name: When used on roadways, bicycles are considered:

about.name: When used on roadways, bicycles are considered:

hasPart.assesses: When used on roadways, bicycles are considered: | When used on roadways, bicycles are considered: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Bicycles are considered vehicles when used on roadways. Bicyclists and motorists are expected to follow the same rules of the road.

comment.text: Hazards.
Vehicles.
Dangerous.
Vehicles.

answerExplanation.text: Bicycles are considered vehicles when used on roadways. Bicyclists and motorists are expected to follow the same rules of the road.

comment.text: When used on roadways, bicycles are considered: | Bicycles are considered vehicles when used on roadways. Bicyclists and motorists are expected to follow the same rules of the road.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers that the roadway will be slippery when wet and they should reduce their speed accordingly.

suggestedAnswer.text: When pavement is wet, reduce your speed.

comment.text: When pavement is wet, reduce your speed.

suggestedAnswer.text: The road ahead winds in a series of turns or curves.

comment.text: The road ahead winds in a series of turns or curves.
Traffic increases ahead.

acceptedAnswer.text: When pavement is wet, reduce your speed.

comment.text: When pavement is wet, reduce your speed.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers that the roadway will be slippery when wet and they should reduce their speed accordingly.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers that the roadway will be slippery when wet and they should reduce their speed accordingly.

hasPart.name: If you come across livestock or other animals on the roadway, you should:

about.name: If you come across livestock or other animals on the roadway, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you come across livestock or other animals on the roadway, you should: | If you come across livestock or other animals on the roadway, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you are driving and come across an animal of any kind in the road, try to slow down and stop if it's safe to do so. Swerving to avoid an animal can be dangerous because your vehicle may lose control and cause an accident.

comment.text: Swerve out of the way.
Slow down and stop.
Ignore them.
Slow down and stop.

answerExplanation.text: If you are driving and come across an animal of any kind in the road, try to slow down and stop if it's safe to do so. Swerving to avoid an animal can be dangerous because your vehicle may lose control and cause an accident.

comment.text: If you come across livestock or other animals on the roadway, you should: | If you are driving and come across an animal of any kind in the road, try to slow down and stop if it's safe to do so. Swerving to avoid an animal can be dangerous because your vehicle may lose control and cause an accident.
